title: 帮忙翻译一下
author: 葉子の
txt_content:
Changelog said:
* Version 61+16
*- Fixed issue where transforming ally monsters would turn hostile to you.
*- Npplayers, neither Ally monsters will try attacking Target Dummies.
*- The game will no longer cause heavy lag when a event npplayer pops up and starts leveling up.
*- Fixed an issue where events that should be completed when timer ends, get stuck if the player didn't contributed.
*- Reduced a bit the experience given by the world events.
*- Skeleton Invasion world event now spawns on the underground, instead of on the surface.
*- Added a item cap to the Copper Collection event.帮忙翻译一下

replies.author: AlbertBlue
replies.txt_content:
更新日志
*版本61+16
*-修复了改变同盟怪物的时候会敌对的问题
*-Npplayers,即使同盟怪物也不会攻击目标假人了
*-游戏不会在加载npplayer事件时卡住并且开始升级了
*-修复了一个当时间结束的时候的问题,如果玩家没有贡献会被卡住
*-减少了一点世界事件的影响
*-骷髅入侵世界的事件现在会发生在地底，而不是在地面
*-在漏斗的收集里添加了帽子物品

replies.author: zghh008
replies.txt_content:
Lightning_Reed 发表于 2017-2-6 12:11
更新日志
*版本61+16
*-修复了改变同盟怪物的时候会敌对的问题*-游戏不会在加载npplayer事件时卡住并且开始升级了
*-游戏不会在npplayer加载或升级事件时卡住
